Testing Guide

Markers

All tests are marked with one or more of:

  • web

  • buttons

  • analysis

  • db

  • integration

Run suite

pytest -m "web or buttons or analysis or db or integration"

Selectors

  • data-testid="pull-data-btn"

  • data-testid="update-analysis-btn"
